data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 558 neighbors who are far from you in Tashkent. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tashkent, Uzbekistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Tashkent, Uzbekistan.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Please, convict the 4,137 believers in Tashkent, Uzbekistan to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 4,137 believers in the state of Tashkent into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the South Asian, general people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Tashkent.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 2,309,600 people living in Tashkent through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Tashkent
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Tashkent
location.people_groups_list: Azerbaijani, Bashkir, Parsee, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Balkar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Azerbaijani (60,000), Bashkir (47,000), Parsee (2,400), Han Chinese, Mandarin (1,300), Balkar (800)
